analysis.description:
PoCGame.payout (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#185-192) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#190)

PoCGame.loseWager (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#209-216) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#213)

PoCGame.play (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#141-169) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#197-204):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#201)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#202)

Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#209-216):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#213)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#214)

Detected issues with version pragma in /data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#7): it allows old versions
PoCGame.randomSeed (/data/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#57) is never used in PoCGame
